name: CRAZED-STARLET mARYLN-STYLE PINK AND VELVET HALTER DRESS M
description:
A sweet looker of a formal in petal-pink silky crepe and deep black velvet -
with spare lines. Classic halter-style bodice, a la Marilyn Monroe’s 7 year itch,
is paired with a long column of velvet. Simple silhouette lets the body speak.
Luscious.


Size MEDIUM Bust 38”, waist 27”, hips 38”, back-neck-to-waist 19”, waist to hem 40”. Condition EXCELLENT Superb shape - no noticable flaws and alterations. No holes, stains or fading and nothing bad to report.

name: vINTAGE 70S AMBER VELVET PARTY SHEATH W/RIBBON BELT S
description: Velvety costume delux!! Vintage 70’s glowing-dark-amber velvet floor-length sheath. Trimmed with wide autumnal blossoms & leaves and brown ribbon sewn with lustrous threads. You will be a graceful, goldenrod flower, an exclamation point, a big gold stripe punctuated with feminine ribbonings! Sharp bust shaping, high neck, long slender skirt, and the velvet belt adds a bow to your navel. Size MEDIUM (My model is a queenly size 8/10—way too tall for the dress.) Bust 35”, waist 28, hips 36”, belt 29-29, armholes 18”, shoulder-to-hem 54”. Condition EXCELLENT Superb shape with no noticable alterations or flaws: Velvet needs a pressing.
